forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
This morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens to a bright and sunny landscape, the clarity punctuating the air with refreshing vibrancy. The chill of fall lingers ever so slightly, guiding the high temperature near 61, though it is destined to slip into the mid-fifties as the afternoon wanes. The gentle north-northeast winds, whispering at around 9 mph, add a refreshing touch, ensuring that whatever warmth the sun offers is met with a pleasant breeze. 

As the day unfolds, the sky remains mostly clear with only a few clouds gracing the horizon, casting playful shadows on the bustling streets below. With the absence of fog, visibility stretches impressively across the bay, drawing the eye towards iconic landmarks like the Golden Gate Bridge, framed by the impossibly blue sky. The evening promises a soft transition, with partly cloudy skies enveloping the city and a temperature dipping to around 50. It would be wise to wear layers—perhaps a light sweater or a denim jacket—perfectly fitting for both the cool breeze and the golden sunlight.

With these conditions, one might take a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, enjoying the lively pulse of the city as it awakens. Alternatively, exploring one of the local coffee shops can provide solace in the day’s embrace, offering a cozy spot to unwind and observe the world drift by. It’s a day that invites exploration, where every corner brims with the potential to make a simple outing feel remarkably special.
